item.title: Comment on Hello world! by A WordPress Commenter
item.dc:creator: A WordPress Commenter
item.description: Hi, this is a comment. To get started with moderating, editing, and deleting comments, please visit the Comments screen in the dashboard. Commenter avatars come from <a href="https://en.gravatar.com/">Gravatar</a>.
item.content:encoded:
Hi, this is a comment.
To get started with moderating, editing, and deleting comments, please visit the Comments screen in the dashboard.
Commenter avatars come from Gravatar.

item.title: Comment on Apollo by Lana Sierra Rocha
item.dc:creator: Lana Sierra Rocha
item.description: I liked everything about this place. The breakfast is excellent. This place feels like a home away from home. Safety was never an issue. You can sleep soundly without having to worry about anything.
item.content:encoded: I liked everything about this place. The breakfast is excellent. This place feels like a home away from home. Safety was never an issue. You can sleep soundly without having to worry about anything.

item.title: Comment on Apollo by Lucio Rossi
item.dc:creator: Lucio Rossi
item.description: The accommodation was immaculate. It was really quiet, no traffic or environmental noises so I slept really well. The furnishings in the room were lovely, spotlessly clean and maintained. And the bathroom I think was the best bathroom I have ever stayed in. Tasteful and beautifully clean. I liked that there is a no shoes indoors policy.
item.content:encoded: The accommodation was immaculate. It was really quiet, no traffic or environmental noises so I slept really well. The furnishings in the room were lovely, spotlessly clean and maintained. And the bathroom I think was the best bathroom I have ever stayed in. Tasteful and beautifully clean. I liked that there is a no shoes indoors policy.

item.title: Comment on Aphrodite by Erik Maurer
item.dc:creator: Erik Maurer
item.description: This apartment is incredible for staying with kids and family: very spacious, with a huge balcony and wide terrace. Enjoyed staying here!
item.content:encoded: This apartment is incredible for staying with kids and family: very spacious, with a huge balcony and wide terrace. Enjoyed staying here!

item.title: Comment on Aphrodite by Nathan Reynolds
item.dc:creator: Nathan Reynolds
item.description: I set my sights on this apartment as soon as I saw it and this was surely the most perfect choice for me. The apartment is super big, clean and thoroughly designed, which I personally do like. All the noise from the streets was left right there and entering the apartment I felt calmness and could relax. Indeed, this is a great accommodation!
item.content:encoded: I set my sights on this apartment as soon as I saw it and this was surely the most perfect choice for me. The apartment is super big, clean and thoroughly designed, which I personally do like. All the noise from the streets was left right there and entering the apartment I felt calmness and could relax. Indeed, this is a great accommodation!

item.title: Comment on Demeter by Freddie Chandler
item.dc:creator: Freddie Chandler
item.description: Very convenient location, easy access to public transportation (both bus and metro), a lot of restaurants nearby. an western super market and oriental food super market in short walk distance. extremely friendly landlord , extremely well functioned kitchen and other facilities. Flexibility of late check out. Bank and department store in walk distance. Easy to find the place and can never get lost!
item.content:encoded: Very convenient location, easy access to public transportation (both bus and metro), a lot of restaurants nearby. an western super market and oriental food super market in short walk distance. extremely friendly landlord , extremely well functioned kitchen and other facilities. Flexibility of late check out. Bank and department store in walk distance. Easy to find the place and can never get lost!

item.title: Comment on Demeter by Jacob Davey
item.dc:creator: Jacob Davey
item.description: The apartment was perfectly located for our needs. It is practically brand new with modern design and furniture. Fully equipped kitchen including coffee machine, washing machine and dishwasher. Good heating system. All our requirements were catered for. Would strongly recommend.
item.content:encoded: The apartment was perfectly located for our needs. It is practically brand new with modern design and furniture. Fully equipped kitchen including coffee machine, washing machine and dishwasher. Good heating system. All our requirements were catered for. Would strongly recommend.

item.title: Comment on Poseidon by Stacy Palmer
item.dc:creator: Stacy Palmer
item.description: Great location only a couple of minutes from the overground station. Very comfortable, large room. Nice bathroom with everything you could need. Good choice at breakfast. Great host.
item.content:encoded: Great location only a couple of minutes from the overground station. Very comfortable, large room. Nice bathroom with everything you could need. Good choice at breakfast. Great host.

item.title: Comment on Poseidon by Cynthia Ivory
item.dc:creator: Cynthia Ivory
item.description: Very friendly staff. Fabulous breakfast – including huge range of choices. Very good location – walking distance of the train station.
item.content:encoded: Very friendly staff. Fabulous breakfast – including huge range of choices. Very good location – walking distance of the train station.

item.title: Comment on Live Music Concerts at Our Hotel by Byron Banks
item.dc:creator: Byron Banks
item.description: At one of such concerts I proposed to my future wife. We were overwhelmed with emotions and had such a loving time here.
item.content:encoded: At one of such concerts I proposed to my future wife. We were overwhelmed with emotions and had such a loving time here.
